name: GLOBAL LEADERSHIP MINISTRY TRUST
briefDescription: Our organisation has been servicing for the total development of the society in terms of health,education,economy and environment .we focus on the welfare of rural of women,children and youths .our health services extend Up-to offering medical services to group of 25 leprosy family.We serve rural population by organizing awareness program on health and education skill development and capacity ,development training's and income generating programmers .We intended to incense living standard of rural population in and around Bangalore .we assure you that we would the extended your services to the maximum if the required financial assistance granted to us
